title: Taliyah is Still Too Weak (RIOT wake Up)
body:
After getting Rekt by RIOT, and {{item:3116}}  getting Nerf its no fun to play her anymore, i think RIOT forget about this champion completely, using FULL combo R,Q,W,E = 90% of mana gone its pointless 


Compare to other mage/ Roaming champ she is the weakest i suppose. I think they will have to either buff her or change this whole champion again as her % of playing rate is dropping a lot .


Ban rate 0.1% ....? No 1 gives a fk about this champion 
pick rate 0.6% .....?

Weakest Mage, also the longer the game goes her chances of winning is less, i hope Riot will do something about her, i used to play her a lot (used to main her) but its been months and months, even i stopped playing her 

People out there who actually love this champion please help and let RIOT notice her kit

reall higher than ryze eq ? or  vlad eq ? -__-

Its laning phase, lets say they are level 5, all have put 3 points into e and 2 into q/w, have 50 ap each, with dorans ring (solely purposes of fair matching).

RYZE

Gains 13.875 mana from passive with 50 ap. 
lv 3 e causes q to do 60% bonus damage
e base is 100 with 30% ap(15) + 2% bonus mana(0.2775), totalling 115.2775 before reduction. 

His q base is 85 + 45% ap (22.5) + 3% bonus mana (0.41625), totalling 107.91625*1.6=172.666

115.2775+172.666=289.651875

This does more damage than 3 points in q and e in e by 1.708375 damage

His highest damage at lv 5 with 50 ap using only 2 spells is 289.65185

----
VLAD

Vlad passive grants 1.5 additional ability power from doran's hp, totalling 51.5 ap
E base is 45, ap scale is 35% granting 18.025 damage, does 2.5% max hp damage (21.125), totalling 84.15
Q is 120 + 60% ability power (30.3), totalling at 150.3, causing his overall damage to be 234.45

Though his empowered q takes 14 second to develop at this stage and is easily avoided, but if is used totals his q at 111% ap (56.055) and base at 222, adding to 278.055 on its own, and  332.205 with e.

His highest damage at lv 5 with 50 ap using only 2 spells is 332.205

----
TALIYAH
55   46.75  39.7375 
W is 80 base + 40% ap scale (20), totalling her w damage at 100
Her e does 110 base on initial hit, with 40% ap, totalling 130 damage, placing her at 230 damage with just the initials of her e and w.
The knock back caused by her w over her e then causes an additional and an additional (due to the minimum) base of  175.264375 and an ap scale of 63.7325% (31.86625)'

Taliyah's highest damage at lv5 with only 2 spells is 437.130625


As is shown she utterly smashes ryze and vlad at their top damages, even with their bonus ap and mana effects.
